meanings.definition: A rail or bar placed along the side of a bed to prevent someone from falling out.
meanings.sent1: The bedrail kept the child safe during the night.
meanings.sent2: She held onto the bedrail as she climbed into bed.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to walk along the bedrail like a tightrope.
meanings.sent4: His determination was a sturdy bedrail against the challenges he faced.
meanings.sent5: The bright red bedrail stood out in the dimly lit room.

meanings.definition: A rail or bar attached to a bed to provide support for getting in and out of bed.
meanings.sent1: Grandma used the bedrail to help herself stand up.
meanings.sent2: The bedrail was a helpful aid for the elderly woman.
meanings.sent3: The bedrail became a makeshift clothes hanger in a pinch.
meanings.sent4: The bedrail was like a loyal friend, always there when needed.
meanings.sent5: The smooth bedrail gleamed in the morning sunlight.
